root: ^U-um excuse me, can I ask you something?
^Y-yeah. You're the Royal Flower Picker, from the capital right? I heard you Flower Pickers are really good at choosing and picking flowers right?
^Yup! Spent a year in training and reading a lot of books on different types of plants and flowers.
^Do you want me to pick some flowers for you?
^U-um yeah. My name is Isaac. You see, there's a boquet I want to make for somebody. But I don't know which flowers to choose, I'm not really knowledgeable when it comes to plants.
^Sure! I would love to help. Who is this boquet for?
^U-um, y-you see, it's um...well, f-for this girl
^T-this u-um girl, well, y-you see, um-
^(He seems really shy about the topic, I'll try not to go deeper into this)
^Don't worry, I think I got an idea. It's for a person you really care about right? I know what flowers to get for her.
^I'm not good at expressing my thoughts. I tend to stumble on my words a lot.
^It's ok, flowers make a good symbol of one's feelings
^One's feelings? I guess I can see that?
^Of course! Alright, for starters, let's get some yellow flowers. They represent closeness and friendship.
^That sounds good. You can find some yellow flowers near the front of the village or to the far east, most right side of the village.
^Ok! I'll be back and pick some flowers for the boquet.
